primaryPhoto.description:
Bollywood’s Iconic Film – DISCO DANCER comes alive on stage at Sadler’s Wells Theatre!
India’s first 100 Cr. film, Disco Dancer (1982) starring Mithun Chakraborty and directed by B. Subhash had unforgettable songs by Bappi Lahiri. Jimmy Jimmy, I Am a Disco Dancer, Koi Yahan Nache Nache and more came to epitomize the Indian Disco Era.
Now, you can enjoy the songs and the story of DISCO DANCER, live on stage, with Saregama Live’s adaptation of the film.
Journey back to the 80s with the costumes, dances, and style of DISCO DANCER. Feel the love between Jimmy and Kim, and the anguish of Jimmy as his mother dies in a wicked conspiracy. Shake a leg to the amazing choreography that combines disco with more modern elements of jazz and hip hop. Laugh at the zany dialogues, delivered to you in our best “Indian” English. Chuckle at the wit of our narrator, well-known stand-up comic, Shazia Mirza.
The best talent in Indian Film and Theatre will transport you to a magical time, for one week of performances in London this winter, starring Arjun Tanwar, Salonie Khanna, Tia Kar, Varun Tewari, and Dipeesh Kashyap among others.
Written by Nicholas Bernard, Irfan, Ali Haji, Khush Mullick and Veer Panchal and adapted from the original script by Dr. Rahi Masoom Reza and Deepak Balraj Vij, this show has superhit songs reimagined by Salim-Sulaiman, direction and choreography by Rajiv Goswami.
Book your SAREGAMA LIMITED, DISCO DANCER theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
